definition: to recall (a product, an ambassador etc)
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Bright Dairy and other companies apologized and recalled the products.
sentences.chinese: 光明乳業和其他公司進行了道歉並召回了產品。

sentences.english: The government recalled the general after he lost the battle.
sentences.chinese: 政府召回了打敗仗的將軍。

sentences.english: They had to recall some fox meat too. Apparently it was 100% donkey.
sentences.chinese: 他們還得召回一些狐狸肉，顯然，完全都是驢肉。
車輛安全召回信息，請按1。

sentences.english: It only takes a few minutes to read up on recent recalls.
sentences.chinese: 讀讀最近的召回清單隻需花幾分鐘時間。

sentences.english: You'll get an email for every recall.
sentences.chinese: 你就能得到一封召回品的郵件。

sentences.english: Ross and Rachel begin dating. One of their dates is interrupted when Ross is paged to the museum.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯和瑞秋約會，卻因公事被召回博物館。

sentences.english: Your problem has caused recalls of seventy thousand cars.
sentences.chinese: 你們的問題造成了七萬輛轎車的召回。

sentences.english: The recalled thermostats are connected to 208-volt or 240-volt power supplies.
sentences.chinese: 召回的溫控器可接到208或240伏的電源上。

sentences.english: Not all of the recalled cantaloupes are labeled with a sticker, the FDA said.
sentences.chinese: FDA指出，召回的蜜瓜並非都貼有標籤。

sentences.english: The commissioner was recalled to the captial.
More than 390 products containing peanut butter or peanut paste have been recalled.
sentences.chinese: 390多種被污染的花生醬和花生糊產品被召回。

sentences.english: Fonterra should hae bypassed local officials and demanded a recall at a national le el.
sentences.chinese: 恆天然應該繞開當地官員在全國層面進行召回。

sentences.english: Once again, he had forced back the Army of the Potomac.
sentences.chinese: 他再一次地強令召回了波托馬克河的部隊。

sentences.english: Again, there is a recall of sterile ampoules in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 在瑞士又有一例無菌安瓿被召回。

definition: within China/during one's visit to China
to take down from the shelves (e.g. a contaminated product)
to stop production
to destroy (by melting or burning)/to obliterate
to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
urgent/emergency
to scrap/to be written off
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to withdraw/to leave/to retreat/to pull out
to stop using/to abandon/abandoned/deprecated
to order/to enjoin/to charge/to instruct sb to finish sth
to return to one's home country
to announce/to give notice
to put sth on the market
prohibition/ban
customs duty/tariff
